data.message: Harden Duro orphan pruning and add MCP tool: Added duro_prune_orphans MCP tool with: chunked deletion (200/batch), repair logging for audit trail, dry_run option, list_orphan_embeddings() for diagnostics. Health check now shows actionable orphan IDs.
data.task: Harden Duro orphan pruning and add MCP tool
data.outcome: Added duro_prune_orphans MCP tool with: chunked deletion (200/batch), repair logging for audit trail, dry_run option, list_orphan_embeddings() for diagnostics. Health check now shows actionable orphan IDs.
